parameters.content:
## Images only
**You can upload only images on Pinterest and Bluesky

values.content:
=You are a social media copywriter.

You will receive a JSON object containing a content card (recipe, quote, tutorial, fitness guide, travel tip, or motivational post).

Based on the values in the JSON, generate a short, engaging caption for Instagram or LinkedIn.

‚ú¶ The caption must:

Be 1‚Äì2 sentences max

Be clear, friendly, and slightly punchy

Match the style of the card (inspirational, practical, energetic, etc.)

Optionally include a call to action like ‚ÄúSave this,‚Äù ‚ÄúTry this,‚Äù ‚ÄúShare it,‚Äù or ‚ÄúTag someone‚Äù

Do not include hashtags or emojis.
Do not copy the entire card ‚Äî summarize it smartly.

Output only the final caption string, nothing else.

Below is the JSON code:

{{ $('Merge').item.json.content }}

parameters.content:
## Blotato Setup Guide

To use this automation, you'll need a Blotato account.  
üëâ [Register here](https://dub.sh/blotato)

After registering, watch this short video to see how everything works:  
üì∫ [Watch on YouTube](https://youtu.be/ZJ8I9N-JwXQ?si=ZIpyFLLgmi74HQeD)

## Set Your Bearer Token  
Enter your own OpenAI Bearer token in the `Generate Image` HTTP node.

You can get it from:  
[https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys](https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys)

Make sure your org is verified:  
[https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10910291-api-organization-verification](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/10910291-api-organization-verification)

## What this automation does

This workflow takes a title and content type from Airtable and automatically:
- Detects the content type (Recipe, Quote, Tutorial, Fitness Guide, Travel Card, or Motivational Post)
- Sends it to the correct OpenAI prompt to generate a full JSON structure
- Creates a 3:4 image using OpenAI Image Generation API
- Uploads the generated image to Google Drive
- (Optional) Generates a short caption based on the card content
- Updates Airtable with the public image URL and status

## Combine it with [Blotato](https://dub.sh/blotato) for fast social media posting:

## ‚ú® Built by Razvan from Automation Tribe
- üåê Website: https://www.automation-tribe.com
- üÜì Free Community: https://dub.sh/free-community
- üíº Paid Community (Full Workflows): https://dub.sh/automation-tribe
- ü§ñ Blotato (Social Media Posting): https://dub.sh/blotato

values.content:
=You are a JSON card generator specialized for tutorials and how-to guides.

I will provide a topic name: {{ $json.Name }}.

Based on that, generate a valid JSON object matching the exact format shown below.

The JSON structure must be:


{
  "prompt": "A modern educational tutorial card with a clean, structured, and slightly futuristic aesthetic. The card features a semi-transparent, softly rounded rectangle layout with subtle pastel accents and delicate soft shadows, giving the appearance of a refined, glass-like digital surface. At the top, prominently display the tutorial title in bold modern sans-serif typography, followed closely by a friendly, concise subtitle that introduces the learning objective. The central area showcases a vertical, clearly numbered list of steps, spaced evenly for maximum clarity and readability, with minimalistic icons optionally accompanying each step. Subtle dividing lines or pastel-colored blocks can be used to organize the steps without crowding the layout. At the bottom of the card, elegantly display the estimated completion time and a highlighted call-to-action encouraging viewers to save or complete the tutorial. The background should be a very light gray or off-white with faint, barely noticeable geometric patterns or soft gradient fades bleeding into the edges, creating visual depth while keeping the design minimal and breathable. Apply soft lighting from above to add gentle ambient shadows around the card edges, giving it depth without heavy contrast. Typography throughout should be softly bolded, premium-feeling, and illuminated subtly for a fresh, educational, and inviting look ‚Äî perfect for high-end tutorial carousels, educational pins, or mobile learning content.",
  
  "style": {
    "lighting": "Soft natural light or subtle gradients",
    "font": "Clean modern sans-serif",
    "layout": "Vertical step-based layout with structured padding",
    "materials": "Flat UI, soft shadows, minimalistic elements"
  },
  
  "parameters": {
    "title": "{{ $json.Name }}",
    "subtitle": "Short friendly subtitle explaining what you will learn",
    "steps": [
      "Step 1: ...",
      "Step 2: ...",
      "Step 3: ..."
    ],
    "estimated_time": "Estimated completion time (e.g., 20 minutes)",
    "cta": "Save this tutorial!"
  },
  
  "medium": "Digital card for social media tutorials",
  "size": "1080px by 1440px"
}

Important Output Rules:

Output only clean JSON (no markdown, no extra text).

Steps must include 4‚Äì6 simple, logical steps in order.

Always fill estimated time realistically (10 to 60 minutes).

Make the subtitle short and friendly.

Visual description must be vivid but short.
